name: Death Worm Slither － Hungry Snake Evolution Attack game
name_original: Death Worm Slither － Hungry Snake Evolution Attack game
description:
Worm Slither. is back with new wings!Now It's really hungry and dangerous!!!
Start slithering!Control it to eat up anything,as people,cars,tanks and helicopters.
even if you're tiny,defeat the army to win.
Eat as much creatures to evolve faster,help it to become larger and stronger.
